ProductInfo.Features:
GW9704H: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW40H: 1/3" HDIS CCD Security Camera, 650TV Line, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 42PCS Infrared LED, 114 feet IR distance, 0.1 Lux Min. illumination
Package Includes:     GW9704H DVR with 500GB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     2 x GW40H - 1/3" HDIS CCD Camera;
1 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW12V0.5A: 12V0.5A Power Supply for Security Cameras.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 2CHE8 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2 x 650TVL 2.8~12mm Varifocal Lens Security Camera System, Free LED Monitor (White/Silver)
